Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Is your name... Chrome?'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You have perfect Tantalum-193 heteropolymer adaptability and beautiful biological readings. Looks like we have a high chance of success.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Judging from what you look like—ah, no, I'm just curious, don't be nervous. This is a private refitting request, right?"}
{2: '???', 3: "You don't look like someone who has no other choice."}
{2: '???', 3: 'A lucky guy from Eden... Young, healthy, well-dressed. You\'re the first refit volunteer I\'ve got "here".'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You should know enough about military Constructs.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Oh, right. The refitting project agreement form... The benefactor has been filled in too.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Good, no problem then. Let's begin."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Performing Tantalum-193 bypassing...'}
{2: '???', 3: "Doesn't it hurt?"}
{2: '???', 3: 'Astounding pain tolerance threshold.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Due to certain constraints, when operating on Constructs, we cannot perform general anesthesia. The screams can get maddening sometimes.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Stunning memory scars... What are you hiding?'}
{2: '???', 3: "Consciousness damage... that's a plus for me. Hmm... specialized refitting... I just had a flash of inspiration."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'Langston finds himself in an unfamiliar space. All he can hear is the conversation between doctors and their assistants.'}
{3: 'It feels like an out-of-body experience. He is looking down on himself in the air—the body is merchandise. A test subject. A perfect fragment. An incomplete Construct.'}
{3: '"A mixture: A material made up of two or more different Chemical substances which are not chemically combined."'}
{3: '"A concrete object made of materials and information, whose borders are continuously constructed and reconstructed."'}
{3: "That's what it says on the book he's not allowed to read."}
{2: '???', 3: '...You need to figure out what you really are.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Adaptability is not the main point of a Construct.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Once the shell called the body is abandoned, what does the human leave behind? That's what you should focus on."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Who are you exactly? And who do you want to become?'}
